title: @Maraudaur - and any other rioters.
body:
Gonna play with friends and hopefully you guys.
Trying to record a vid.

You can only play Shuriman based champions.
lemme know if your interested XD

replies.body: What time? I could definitely play one tonight around 7pm.

That's cool with me.
I'm in SA so its 10:50 for me right now.

Got nay rioter friends that wanna play?

not sure, I will invite whoever is online at the time though. 

Do you have me in client?
Nope you neva added me :(

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Bc1Q7FQq,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-25T02:00:05.305+0000)
>
> Nope you neva added me :(

RIP
all sorted. Excited to play a game tonight. Anyone else from boards joining?

As much as id love to bring my Taliyah to the game, Im promised tonight to friends for the endless struggle of ranked.

I reckon in the near future though, we as a OCE boards community should organise themed tournaments.

Allocate players into teams (based on what champs we have)

Have Shuriman, Noxian, Damacian, Ionian, Freljordian, Bilgewater and Void, etc etc (providing they have a full team comp of course.. Sorry Targon)

and see which nation comes out on top in OCE.
That would be cool, and apparently your Tal is really good so it would be nice.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Bc1Q7FQq,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2016-08-25T04:26:01.150+0000)
>
> That would be cool, and apparently your Tal is really good so it would be nice.

"That would be cool, and apparently your **self-proclaimed** Tal is really good so it would be nice.
lol XD
Sounds like a cool idea. I wonder if there is enough interest on the boards.
I don't know about other boards but I would also be interested in spectating or watching a stream of the match, so I think it would be pretty popular.

I also cant stream (I would bloody love too)
But I live in a town, and the council here are dumb.
Well i'm sure the Rito players can stream it ;)

That would be awesome.
(Because then they can say I have a YouTube channel huehuehuehue)
I'll be super down for it
Ill create a post about it to see.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Bc1Q7FQq,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-25T03:03:20.428+0000)
>
> As much as id love to bring my Taliyah to the game, Im promised tonight to friends for the endless struggle of ranked.
> 
> I reckon in the near future though, we as a OCE boards community should organise themed tournaments.
> 
> Allocate players into teams (based on what champs we have)
> 
> Have Shuriman, Noxian, Damacian, Ionian, Freljordian, Bilgewater and Void, etc etc (providing they have a full team comp of course.. Sorry Targon)
> 
> and see which nation comes out on top in OCE.

ad sol = adc

>Sorry Targon

You can put Targon in, just give them an ADC (or leave them without the ADC and let them have Aurelion since he is basically their slave.)
and yordle?

Bandle City has the numbers.

(Corki, Heimer, Poppy, Rumble, Teemo, Tristana, Ziggs, not to mention you can mostly just count Gnar, Lulu and Veigar.)
and kled and kennen.
Kennen is Ionian and Kled is Noxian (while they were both born in Bandle City, they actually have alternate alignments.)

I do not know, I have some friends from my Helping Others Improve series, that will be joining.
I do want to have a whole bunch of games, if not today/tomorow.
At least Fitzky and I (Jonius7), intend to be joining Yasei from the Helping Others Improve club.
I ended up adding Yasei and should be around during the game if people are needed.
I shall be taking part in this

Just when you think you've quite League.

Riot pulls you back in.
Eh this may or may not be my final game we will see

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xmREHrE4,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-08-26T02:34:03.294+0000)
>
> Let's work on organising something! Message me on Discord @LordSess @Yasei
> 
> https://discordapp.com/invite/0gqfewWcRxU8di5X

Just so you get the notification ;)

There is a lot of people on.
Was there somethign specific you wanted?

I do know that sometime soon, I will be talking with all the Yellows/Greens/Blues soon about some stuff.
Yeah I was just talking to Marauder about stuff.
I would be interested to join if you have any free slots. :)
Can I spectate or watch this match somehow?
Yasei intends to record this and post it up on his YouTube channel later on. Streaming it may be out of scope however.

I cant stream, stuck on ADSL 2 :(
I've tried many times.
I'll be recording the matches, and making a video(s) out of em.
I would be interested. Just depends on free time etc...
